Play.Header: BLT wins the coin toss and elects to defer. CIN elects to Receive, and BLT elects to defend the west goal.
7-B.Cundiff kicks 76 yards from BLT 30 to CIN -6. 28-B.Scott, Touchback. Billy Cundiff's 39th touchback of season - one shy of NFL record.
